body_html:
Hi @drpngx thanks a lot for your help.
I think I'm following the same instructions as @shaolinkhoa .

Create a tensorflow static library using the makefile as in:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/master/tensorflow/contrib/makefile#raspberry-pi
make -f tensorflow/contrib/makefile/Makefile HOST_OS=PI TARGET=PI
OPTFLAGS="-Os -mfpu=neon-vfpv4 -funsafe-math-optimizations -ftree-vectorize" CXX=g++-4.8

Yes, you are right, I ran the tensorflow/contrib/makefile/Makefile first to build tensorflow.
Seemed to build OK. No errors.

Then tried to compile the label_image example from makefile and received the graph.pb.h error.
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/master/tensorflow/contrib/pi_examples
make -f tensorflow/contrib/pi_examples/label_image/Makefile

Thanks a lot for any suggestions!

body:
Hi @drpngx thanks a lot for your help.
I think I'm following the same instructions as @shaolinkhoa .

Create a tensorflow static library using the makefile as in:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/master/tensorflow/contrib/makefile#raspberry-pi
make -f tensorflow/contrib/makefile/Makefile HOST_OS=PI TARGET=PI \
 OPTFLAGS="-Os -mfpu=neon-vfpv4 -funsafe-math-optimizations -ftree-vectorize" CXX=g++-4.8

Yes, you are right, I ran the tensorflow/contrib/makefile/Makefile first to build tensorflow.
Seemed to build OK. No errors.

Then tried to compile the label_image example from makefile and received the graph.pb.h error.
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/master/tensorflow/contrib/pi_examples
make -f tensorflow/contrib/pi_examples/label_image/Makefile

Thanks a lot for any suggestions!
